recoveryPhrase.title: Set up recovery phrase
recoveryPhrase.text1: Keep your wallet safe by backing up your recovery seed. Save or write down the 24 secret words below and store them in a secure location.  These words are essential for recovering your funds if you ever lose access to your device.

syncDevice.ensureTheSafety: Speichern oder notieren Sie die 24 geheimen W√∂rter unten und bewahren Sie sie an einem sicheren Ort auf. Diese W√∂rter sind wichtig, um Ihr Konto wiederherzustellen, wenn Sie jemals den Zugriff auf Ihr Ger√§t verlieren.

profileSetupInfo.title: Keet Profile update üöÄ
profileSetupInfo.description:
It‚Äôs time to take your Keet experience to the next level!¬†üéâ With this upgrade, you‚Äôll unlock:

‚ú® **Direct Messaging**: Send and receive private messages with ease.
‚ú® **Profile Recovery**: Securely restore your account and chats on any device.
‚ú® **Simple Setup**: Set up your profile in just 3 clicks‚Äîyour private seed phrase is safely stored on¬†your¬†device only.

No worries‚Äîthis upgrade won‚Äôt affect your current rooms or chats. Everything stays right where it belongs!
